user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios for the years 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes and convert the results to TST format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operations based on the user's input regarding hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios using scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.

tasks.description: Decompose the annual hydrogen demand for TYNDP 2026 scenarios ('NT', 'NT_HE', 'NT_LE') for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 into hourly profiles.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's scenario for generating hourly hydrogen demand profiles using the specified scenarios and years.

function_args.user_input: Decompose annual hydrogen demand into hourly profiles for scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', 'NT_LE' and years 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050.

tasks.description: Split the nodes as specified in the scenario to handle the hourly demand profile details separately.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's scenario: split the nodes managing the hourly demand profiles for clarity and separate handling.

tasks.description: Convert the generated hourly hydrogen demand profiles into the TST format for the TYNDP 2026 study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's scenario: transform the hourly demand data into TST format for stakeholder review.

function_args.user_input: Convert the hourly hydrogen demand profiles into the standardized TST format as required by the TYNDP 2026 study team.
